stratego.mode.menus.main

Class MainMenuUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Scene
      • stratego.mode.Mode
        • stratego.mode.menus.main.MainMenuUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class MainMenuUI
extends Mode
    Main Menu UI The main menu contains multiple buttons leading to the game screen (single and multiplayer), as well as a settings button and a logout button. The main menu also holds a friends list VBox with information unique to the user logged in.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MainMenuUI

        public MainMenuUI()
        Constructor. Uses the BorderPane format to create the main menu.

    • Method Detail

      • addFriend

        public void addFriend(javafx.scene.layout.VBox friends,
                      FriendsList friendsList,
                      FriendModel friendModel)
        Adds a friend to this users friendlist. For demo 3, this method will be moved to the components package into the FriendsList class so that other screens can utilize this feature without duplication of code.
        Parameters:
        friends - The VBox containing the components of the friend list.
        friendsList - The logged in users friend list.
        friendModel - The observable FriendModel object of this user.
